Package ru.soloviev.domain.entities

Class CreditAccount

java.lang.Object
ru.soloviev.domain.entities.CreditAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAccount
public class CreditAccount extends Object implements IAccount
Class of account that have not percent of income, but can have negative balance and have commission if it happened

    • ReduceMoney

      public BigDecimal ReduceMoney(BigDecimal money, boolean verified, BigDecimal limit) throws AccountException, BankException
      Reduce money to account
      Specified by:
      ReduceMoney in interface IAccount
      Parameters:
      money - sum that we want to subtract, positive
      verified - flag, if true - account has not limit
      limit - maximal sum that can be subtracted
      Returns:
      how much money was subtracted (for transfer history)
      Throws:
      BankException - if verified of operation was failed with bank information
      AccountException - if verified of operation was failed with balance information
